about_the_game:
Welcome to Mythic Merchants, where fantasy and time management collide in a spellbinding workshop adventure! Step into a magical realm where you run a bustling workshop, crafting custom equipment for a variety of fantastical clients. Each order brings a unique challenge, and you’ll need to stay on your toes as the clock ticks away!

Meet your eclectic team of workshop heroes:


Tony: The quirky mechanist with the power of chronomancy. Tony can pause time, giving your workshop a crucial breather during hectic moments.

Mino: The cheerful minotaur with incredible strength. Mino can swiftly modify parts, speeding up your production process.

Rana: The wizard frog and alchemical expert. Rana concocts potions with unmatched precision, ensuring every magical ingredient is perfect.

Vulf: The inventive wolf who loves to experiment. Vulf’s teleportation abilities let him tackle tasks across the workshop with flair.


In Mythic Merchants, you'll craft every piece of equipment from scratch, applying your skills and creativity to meet the demands of your enchanted clientele. As you journey through different eras, you'll have the opportunity to upgrade your workshop, evolving it from a humble forge to a state-of-the-art magical production facility.

Upgrade and Automate Your Workshop:


Era-Based Enhancements: Travel through time and unlock technological advancements that allow you to upgrade your workshop. Improve the speed, efficiency, and safety of your tools and machinery with each era you visit. From primitive anvils to sophisticated automated workstations, your workshop will evolve with cutting-edge innovations.

Safety and Efficiency: Each upgrade not only enhances the speed of production but also ensures safer operations. Reinforce your workshop with better equipment and safeguards to handle increasingly complex orders with ease.

Goblin Interns: Recruit a team of goblin interns to assist with the daily grind. These mischievous yet efficient helpers will move objects, manage supplies, and keep your workshop running smoothly, allowing you to focus on the more intricate aspects of crafting.

Manage your time wisely, upgrade your tools, and master the art of magical craftsmanship in this enchanting simulation. Will you rise to the challenge and become the ultimate Mythic Merchant? Your workshop awaits!
